author: BJC1912
title: Perfect weekend
text:
For our wedding, my husband and I booked a block of rooms for our out of town guests. We also stayed there for the duration of the wedding.
I cannot recommend The Roger highly enough. To a person, the staff is warm, welcoming, helpful, and friendly. There is complimentary wine in the evening during the week in the hotel's comfortable and cute lounge, which was a great place to gather and chat with guests.
The rooms themselves are well appointed and extremely comfortable; my only regret is that we didn't get a chance to enjoy our room's terrace because of the March blizzard!
It's also very well located, close to public transportation, Madison Square Park, Herald Square, and a lot of other sights, but it's not noisy or crowded. It's really a perfect place to stay.
